languages.text: "Теперь ты говоришь лишь с разрешения сво{mf|его|ей} карманн{mf|ого|ой} мон-ка{mf|я|й}?" {n}Иремерисс издевательски смеется.{/n} "Мой ничтожный младший брат, тебе не следовало даже вылезать из нашей общей утробы, чтобы не унижать одним своим появлением нашу кровь..."

"Now you speak only with the permission of your pet mon-keigh?" {n}Yremeryss laughs mockingly.{/n} "My insignificant little brother, you never should have crawled out of our mother's womb, your existence is a disgrace to our blood..."
languages.original_text: "Теперь ты говоришь лишь с разрешения сво{mf|его|ей} карманн{mf|ого|ой} мон-ка{mf|я|й}?" {n}Иремерисс издевательски смеется.{/n} "Мой ничтожный младший брат, тебе не следовало даже вылезать из нашей общей утробы, чтобы не унижать одним своим появлением нашу кровь..."

traits.locale_text: "Now you speak only with the permission of your pet mon-keigh?" {n}Yremeryss laughs mockingly.{/n} "My insignificant little brother, you never should have crawled out of our mother's womb, your existence is a disgrace to our blood..."

"Now you speak only with the permission of your pet mon-keigh?" {n}Yremeryss laughs mockingly.{/n} "My insignificant little brother, you never should have crawled out of our mother's womb, your existence is a disgrace to our blood..."

"Now you speak only with the permission of your pet mon-keigh?" {n}Yremeryss laughs mockingly.{/n} "My insignificant little brother, you never should have crawled out of our mother's womb, your existence is a disgrace to our blood..."

"Now you speak only with the permission of your pet mon-keigh?" {n}Yremeryss laughs mockingly.{/n} "My insignificant little brother, you never should have crawled out of our mother's womb, your existence is a disgrace to our blood..."

languages.text: “只有你的宠物猴子允许你开口的时候，你才敢开口吗？”{n}伊芮梅莉斯嘲弄地大笑起来。{/n}“噢，我微不足道的弟弟，你根本不该从母亲的子宫里爬出来。你的存在简直是家族血脉的耻辱……”
languages.original_text: "Now you speak only with the permission of your pet mon-keigh?" {n}Yremeryss laughs mockingly.{/n} "My insignificant little brother, you never should have crawled out of our mother's womb, your existence is a disgrace to our blood..."

traits.locale_text: “只有你的宠物猴子允许你开口的时候，你才敢开口吗？”{n}伊芮梅莉斯嘲弄地大笑起来。{/n}“噢，我微不足道的哥哥，你根本不该从母亲的子宫里爬出来。你的存在简直是家族血脉的耻辱……”

languages.text: « Vous avez donc besoin de la permission de votre mon-keigh domestique pour parler, maintenant ? {n}se moque Yremeryss en ricanant.{/n} Mon cher et insignifiant petit frère, vous n'auriez jamais dû sortir du ventre de notre mère. Votre existence même est une insulte à notre sang... »
languages.original_text: "Now you speak only with the permission of your pet mon-keigh?" {n}Yremeryss laughs mockingly.{/n} "My insignificant little brother, you never should have crawled out of our mother's womb, your existence is a disgrace to our blood..."

traits.locale_text: « Vous avez donc besoin de la permission de votre mon-keigh domestique pour parler, maintenant ? {n}se moque Yremeryss en ricanant.{/n} « Mon cher et insignifiant petit frère, vous n'auriez jamais dû sortir du ventre de notre mère. Votre existence même est une insulte à notre sang... »

languages.text: «¿Es que ahora solo hablas con permiso de tu mon-keigh mascota?». {n}Yremeryss ríe, burlona.{/n} «Mi insignificante hermanito, nunca deberías haber salido del útero de nuestra madre. Tu existencia es una vergüenza para nuestra sangre...».
languages.original_text: "Now you speak only with the permission of your pet mon-keigh?" {n}Yremeryss laughs mockingly.{/n} "My insignificant little brother, you never should have crawled out of our mother's womb, your existence is a disgrace to our blood..."

traits.locale_text: «¿Es que ahora solo hablas con permiso de tu mon-keigh mascota?». {n}Yremeryss ríe, burlona.{/n} «Mi insignificante hermanito, nunca deberías haber salido del útero de nuestra madre. Tu existencia es una vergüenza para nuestra sangre...».

languages.text: 「今はペットのモン＝ケイの許可がなければ喋れないのか？」{n}イレメリスが嘲るように笑う。{/n}「取るに足りない我が弟よ、貴様は母の子宮から這い出てくるべきではなかった。貴様の存在は我らの血統の恥さらしだ…」
languages.original_text: "Now you speak only with the permission of your pet mon-keigh?" {n}Yremeryss laughs mockingly.{/n} "My insignificant little brother, you never should have crawled out of our mother's womb, your existence is a disgrace to our blood..."

traits.locale_text: 「今はペットのモン＝ケイの許可がなければ喋れないのか？」{n}イレメリスが嘲るように笑う。{/n}「取るに足りない我が弟よ、貴様は母の子宮から這い出てくるべきではなかった。貴様の存在は我らの血統の恥さらしだ…」

languages.text: "Nun sprecht Ihr nur noch mit Erlaubnis Eures zahmen Chem-Pan-Sey?" {n}Yremeryss lacht spöttisch.{/n} "Mein unbedeutender kleiner Bruder, Ihr hättet nie aus dem Schoß unserer Mutter kriechen sollen, Eure Existenz ist eine Schande für unser Blut ..."
languages.original_text: "Now you speak only with the permission of your pet mon-keigh?" {n}Yremeryss laughs mockingly.{/n} "My insignificant little brother, you never should have crawled out of our mother's womb, your existence is a disgrace to our blood..."

traits.locale_text: "Nun sprecht Ihr nur noch mit Erlaubnis Eures zahmen Chem-Pan-Sey?" {n}Yremeryss lacht spöttisch.{/n} "Mein unbedeutender kleiner Bruder, Ihr hättet nie aus dem Schoß unserer Mutter kriechen sollen, Eure Existenz ist eine Schande für unser Blut ..."

languages.text: "Şimdi de sadece evcil mon-keigh'in izin verdikçe mi konuşabiliyorsun?" {n}Yremeryss, alaycı bir tavırla gülüyor.{/n} "Benim değersiz küçük kardeşim, annemizin rahminden hiç çıkmamalıydın. Varlığın, kanımıza sürülmüş bir lekeden ibaret."
languages.original_text: "Now you speak only with the permission of your pet mon-keigh?" {n}Yremeryss laughs mockingly.{/n} "My insignificant little brother, you never should have crawled out of our mother's womb, your existence is a disgrace to our blood..."

traits.locale_text: "Şimdi de sadece evcil mon-keigh'in izin verdikçe mi konuşabiliyorsun?" {n}Yremeryss alaycı bir tavırla gülüyor.{/n} "Benim değersiz küçük kardeşim, annemizin rahminden hiç çıkmamalıydın. Senin varlığın kanımızdaki bir lekeden başka bir şey değil."
